#summary Infos about the 2.6.35 kernel

= Bugs =
  * Sensor does not report temperature right (stays at 36 degree)
  * Backlight of the buttons does not light up automatically (but the can be enabled by writing to /sys/devices/platform/eve-keyled/{shift,setting,enable}
  * Flash light does not work
  * Resuming from sleep sometines makes the screen very colorful. Just unlock by dragging this thing with a finger and it restores.
  * Camera does not work
  * Bluetooth does not work (needs wifi)
  * Kernel uses the old graphics framework
  * we have brought our own compass driver in drivers/i2c/chips/akm8973.c
 but there is already one in drivers/misc/akm8973.c. See if we can use that.
  * Change sensors.eve to support the new proximity device /dev/proximity. Proximity values are no longer served by the akm device.
  * What should arch/arm/mach-msm/rpc_server_time_remote.c do?
